Mumblings of a designer x frontend developer
Read the articles Read the articles

Hi, I'm Deepak Gangwar

I love drawing and used to draw cartoons, which I thought I’d do later in life. But when I was 14 years old, my friend made a website and hyperlinked an image to another page. That was it—a point of no return. I knew I had to pursue front-end development. It is the perfect equilibrium for my need for creativity and mental stimulation.

I seek to create websites for people. I love my work. I do it until my fingers bleed or my eyes are ready to fall out of my head. Even when no one is listening or watching, every project is an impressive feat, because I, as a creator, am happy. Perhaps even ecstatic.
